title: Beginner's Guide to F1 Terms
subtitle: Frontend Development with HTML & CSS
text: A dive into the thrilling world of Formula 1 racing. As a front-end developer on this project, I worked primarily with HTML and CSS to modernize a previously used template. Collaborating closely with designers, the project focused on a visually pleasing and user-friendly design, clarifying and defining popular F1 terms. By utilizing HTML for structured content presentation and CSS for stylistic enhancements, we ensured an engaging and seamless user experience for anyone new to F1 racing.

title: Rebirth of Hinchliffe Stadium
subtitle: Contributing Development & QA
text: An chronicle of Hinchliffe Stadium's rebirth, a project where I served as a contributing developer. Complying with design specifications, I built various modules that played a crucial role in the site design, contributing to the overall visual storytelling of the stadium's reconstruction and its complicated history. In addition to this, my role included supporting the project quality assurance, ensuring the functionality and responsiveness of the developed modules, thereby enhancing the user interaction and overall experience of the site.

title: Scroll-Based Video Scrubber
subtitle: Sync Playback with HTML, CSS & JS
text: Discover a unique way to interact with videos using this scroll-based scrubber. This CodePen project leverages HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to link a video tag object with the user's scroll position, creating an immersive experience.

title: Interactive Restaurant Menu Manager
subtitle: React, Firebase & Cloud Firestore Powered Solution
text: Introducing a cutting-edge, interactive restaurant menu manager that simplifies the process of adding and deleting menu items. This single-page application, developed with React and React Bootstrap, leverages the power of Cloud Firestore's realtime database and Firebase's back-end service for seamless data synchronization. The intuitive CRUD interface, responsive design, and smooth navigation create an unparalleled user experience. Custom React hooks and effective state management make this app an essential tool for modern restaurant owners and managers.

title: Sneaker Smarter Lead Capture
subtitle: HTML, CSS & PHP Integration
text: A custom lead capture page for Sneaker Smarter, a weekly sneaker news site. This project involved updating the design with provided assets, creating a responsive layout using HTML, CSS, and PHP, and embedding essential functions.

title: Dynamic List Pagination & Filtering
subtitle: Enhancing UX with JS, HTML, & CSS
text: Explore a project that leverages JavaScript and progressive enhancement to transform a default list of 54 students into a dynamic, paginated list. Displaying 10 students per page, the solution incorporates navigation buttons, enabling users to easily browse through the list in a user-friendly manner.

title: FinTech Business Website Design
subtitle: Branding & Development with HTML, CSS & JS
text: Discover a small yet impactful website designed for a European financial tech company. This project entailed crafting the company's logo and site identity while also handling the site's coding, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a visually appealing and functional online presence.

title: Advanced Interactive Registration Form
subtitle: JS, jQuery, HTML & CSS Integration
text: A project featuring an enhanced interactive registration form using Vanilla JavaScript and jQuery. With a focus on user experience, tasks included setting input field focus, creating unobtrusive fields, managing checkbox conditions, calculating item totals, displaying appropriate payment sections, and implementing form validation with error messages. The solution also supports real-time validation and works without JavaScript.

title: News App Landing Page
subtitle: HTML, CSS & Figma Design
text: Explore a captivating landing page for a news-based social media app. With only the logo and app screenshots provided, this project highlights skillful use of HTML, CSS, and Figma in design and prototyping, delivering an appealing user experience.
